alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Logan; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 5:23PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTHERN WICHITA...SOUTHEASTERN WALLACE...SOUTHWESTERN LOGAN AND NORTHEASTERN GREELEY COUNTIES... At 422 PM MST/522 PM CST/, an area of heavy snow was located 9 miles south of Wallace, or 11 miles southeast of Sharon Springs, moving south at 30 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. This area of heavy snow will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Wichita, southeastern Wallace, southwestern Logan and northeastern Greeley Counties. Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter of a mile in this area of heavy snow. This includes portions of Highway 25 in northern Wichita County. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
